articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Setback to Centre as Supreme Court rules royalty on minerals is not tax - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The top court held that states have the legislative competence to impose taxes on mines and minerals-bearing lands under the Constitution. | Latest News India
articles.content:
In a landmark verdict, the Supreme Court on Thursday dealt a major blow to the Centre ruling that the royalty payable on minerals does not constitute a tax.

articles.description: Kalki 2898 AD box office collection day 28: The Prabhas-starrer managed to bring in Rs 1.6 crore domestically on its 28th day in the theatres, taking its domestic total to Rs 622.1 crore.
